contest-event.event-date: April 7, 1963 D Durham League Contest (Section D) Durham League Contest (Section D) 40 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-d The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow.
